content: Going forward, during the 2023 through 2025 timeframe, we expect combined production of more than 6 million ounces with relatively stable production each year and a renewed focus on capital discipline, cash flow generation and resiliency. Our third quarter adjusted operating cash flow was $259 million, up slightly from the second quarter, as higher production and lower costs offset lower gold prices. Your line is open.
